config.description: Login then add item to card, verify that one item is there add to the cart

cases.title: Add Sauce Labs Backpack to cart and verify item count
steps: Click 'Add to cart' for Sauce Labs Backpack using selector: #add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack
Click shopping cart icon using selector: .shopping_cart_link
Verify Sauce Labs Backpack is present in the cart using selector: #item_4_title_link

config.description: Login then add item to card, verify that one item is there add to the cart

cases.title: Add an item to the cart and verify cart contents
steps: Click the 'Add to cart' button for the Sauce Labs Backpack using selector: #add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack
Click the shopping cart icon using selector: .shopping_cart_link
Verify the 'Sauce Labs Backpack' is displayed in the cart with quantity 1 using selector: #item_4_title_link

config.description: Login then add item to card, verify that one item is there add to the cart

cases.title: Add item to cart and verify count
steps: Add Sauce Labs Backpack to cart using selector: #add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack
Navigate to the cart page by clicking the shopping cart icon using selector: #shopping_cart_container a
Verify Sauce Labs Backpack is present in the cart using selector: #item_4_title_link
